name: Red Rover
description: RED ROVER is a Mars driving simulator that uses NASA HiRISE satellite data and imagery to replicate a traversable terrain on the PC for you to drive around and explore!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8, 8.1, 10 Processor: Core I7, 2.8 GHZ or better Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX 1060 or equivalent Storage: 5 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Core I7, 2.8 GHZ or better Memory: 16 MB RAM Graphics: GTX 1070/1080 or equivalent Storage: 5 GB available space
